oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Resistens mod stinkbrand (Tilletia tritici) i hvede og triticale. Resultater af markforsøg 2006
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nielsen, Bent J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Results of testing of Danish winter and spring varieties of wheat and triticale for resistance against common bunt (Tilletia tritici). The field tests are performed with artificial inoculation of different isolates of T. tritici
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Deneken G. & Pedersen J. B. (eds), Danmarks Jordbrugsforskning & Dansk Landbrugsrådgivning
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nielsen, Bent J. (2006) Resistens mod stinkbrand (Tilletia tritici) i hvede og triticale. Resultater af markforsøg 2006. [Resistance against common bunt (Tilletia tritici) in winter and spring types of wheat and triticale. Results of field trials 2006.] Sortsforsøg 2006, p. 53.
